Comment: The United States Department of Agriculture is demanding that states ensure illegal immigrants are not using food stamps.  The department wants states to comply with President Donald Trumpâ€™s executive order from February that seeks improved methods to check that those in the country illegally do not receive federal benefits, including the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP).
Author: Sure-Wishbone-4293

Comment: I don't support this.  In most states you can only get SNAP if you are elderly, disabled, or have minor children.   Most SNAP recipients are families with kids.  I want illegal aliens deported, but in the meantime I do not want their kids to starve.
Author: LatinNameHere
